data.name: AM:PM Convert 24h to AM PM format
data.description:
Your task is to convert an integer time like 945 to a 12 hour time like "09:45 AM" or or 2120 to the corresponding 12 hour time "09:20 PM".

Write a function that receives an integer representing a time in a 24h representation (i.e. 1515 represents "03:15 PM", 0 represents "12:00 AM") and returns the corresponding AM PM formatted time string. 

You may asumme a valid integer is received (i.e. no check are needed for 1188 or negatives integer etc.)

509 is possible though, and for this the function should return "05:09 AM".

Attention: The string returned should always contain 4 digits, so 1515 translates to 03:15 PM and not 3:15PM
